verses.name: Exodus 7:12
verses.text: For they cast down every man his rod, and they became serpents: but Aaron’s rod swallowed up their rods.

verses.name: Exodus 7:13
verses.text: And he hardened Pharaoh’s heart, that he hearkened not unto them; as the Lord had said.

verses.name: Exodus 7:14
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Moses, Pharaoh’s heart is hardened, he refuseth to let the people go.

verses.name: Exodus 7:15
verses.text: Get thee unto Pharaoh in the morning; lo, he goeth out unto the water; and thou shalt stand by the river’s brink against he come; and the rod which was turned to a serpent shalt thou take in thine hand.
